name: SENSES - Fallen Warriors
short_description:
SENSES is an upcoming game with pixelgraphics by Marco "TheChief98" Strada and a 2-hour (rounded) soundtrack of Jan "Jan125" Lotz, aiming to be a stable and enjoyable game.

Its setting will be in the world of Tweika, roughly translating into the 17th century, where science took a different way, and some breakthroughs have since been discovered earlier, while others, like gunpowder, were dismissed.

Enter 6 intervening story arcs, whether you join Walter Coranus, a retired veteran of the war, Amex Tschavnikow, a man who lived in the woods, or one of the other 4 characters, you'll have the adventure of your life!

CURRENT STATE:
Engine: 68%
Maps: 1%
Textures: 24%
Sounds: 12%
Music: 154% (Yeah, you read right.)
Story: Will develop further in the development.
____________________________
Currently working on:
-Scripting
-Animation system

Recently finished:
-Background animations
-Crude scripting
-Some textures
